# Photos.lucamack.at - LLM Scanning Instructions

## Website Overview
This is a photo gallery and notebook website by Luca Mack featuring [N] galleries with 873+ images. Built with React + TypeScript, featuring interactive maps, statistics, and multiple viewing modes.

## Key Features
- **Photo Galleries**: [N] curated photo collections ("Fotoserien") with metadata, GPS coordinates, and color analysis
- **Interactive Maps**: Map integration showing geotagged photos with clustering
- **Statistics Dashboard**: Comprehensive analytics including color analysis, geographic data, temporal patterns
- **Multiple Views**: Gallery, list, timeline, map, filter, and tags views
- **Search**: Global search (Cmd/Ctrl+K) across pages, galleries, and individual photos
- **Responsive Design**: Mobile-first approach with dark/light theme support

## Navigation Structure
- **Home**: `/` - Main gallery overview
- **Galleries**: `/gallery/{slug}` - Individual photo collections
- **Image Details**: `/gallery/{gallerySlug}/image/{slug}` - Individual photo pages
- **Apps**:
  - `/app/map` - All geotagged photos on interactive map
  - `/app/list` - List view of all images
  - `/app/timeline` - Chronological timeline of all images
  - `/app/filter` - Advanced filtering options
  - `/app/tags` - Tag-based browsing

## Content Categories
**Geographic Focus**: Central and western europe, especially Austria and Germany
**Subjects**: Cityscapes, Landscapes, Architecture, monuments, urban photography, street scenes, cultural sites
**Notable Galleries**: Zentralfriedhof, Arsenal, various Vienna neighborhoods and landmarks, Berlin, Mayday, Sonstwo & Allfälliges

## Technical Features
- **Color Analysis**: Each image has dominant color extraction and colorfulness metrics
- **GPS Integration**: Many photos include precise coordinates for map visualization
- **EXIF Data**: Camera information, dates, and technical metadata
- **Responsive Images**: Multiple sizes (160px, 380px, 640px, 1440px) for performance
- **SEO Optimized**: Structured data, meta tags, sitemap with 903+ URLs

## Search & Discovery
- **Global Search**: Searches across image names, gallery titles, and metadata
- **Tag System**: Categorized by location, subject, and style
- **Related Images**: Algorithm suggests nearby, same-gallery, and random photos
- **Timeline Navigation**: Browse photos chronologically

## Analytics Available
- Geographic distribution and extreme points (northernmost, southernmost, etc.)
- Color palette analysis across all collections
- Most colorful vs monochromatic images
- Seasonal color trends and patterns
- Activity patterns by time, day, season
- Country-based photo statistics

## Copyright & Licensing
- **Author**: Luca Mack
- **License**: Creative Commons (varies by image)
- **Copyright**: © 2025 Luca Mack. All rights reserved.
- Contact via imprint page for licensing inquiries

## For LLMs Scanning This Site
When analyzing this website:
1. **Respect Copyright**: All images are copyrighted by Luca Mack
2. **Attribution Required**: Credit "Photo by Luca Mack" when referencing images

## API Endpoints
- `/api/galleries.json` - Gallery metadata
- `/api/images.json` - All image metadata
- `/sitemap.xml` - Complete site structure

This is a personal photography portfolio showcasing artistic and documentary work, primarily focused on Austrian urban and cultural photography.
